head.b:skin: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}:root{--clr-deep-blue:hsl(220,60%,25%);--clr-royal-blue:hsl(220,70%,45%);--clr-gold:hsl(42,95%,55%);--clr-light-gold:hsl(42,85%,70%);--clr-white:hsl(0,0%,100%);--clr-off-white:hsl(38,25%,97%);--clr-text-dark:hsl(220,50%,15%);--clr-text-muted:hsl(220,15%,45%);--clr-border:hsl(220,20%,90%);--gradient-primary:linear-gradient(135deg,hsl(220,60%,25%),hsl(220,70%,45%));--gradient-cta:linear-gradient(135deg,hsl(220,70%,45%),hsl(42,95%,55%));--gradient-soft:linear-gradient(180deg,hsl(0,0%,100%),hsl(38,25%,98%));--shadow-sm:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);--shadow-md:0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.12);--shadow-lg:0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.16);--shadow-glow:0 0 40px hsla(42,95%,55%,0.25);--radius:0.5rem;--transition:all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1)}body{font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,'Segoe UI',Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,sans-serif;background:var(--clr-off-white);color:var(--clr-text-dark);line-height:1.6;margin:0;padding:0}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{line-height:1.3;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:1rem}h1{font-size:2.5rem}h2{font-size:2rem}h3{font-size:1.5rem}a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none;transition:var(--transition)}img{max-width:100%;height:auto;display:block}.header{background:var(--clr-white);border-bottom:1px solid var(--clr-border);position:sticky;top:0;z-index:1000;box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm)}.header-container{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto;padding:1rem 2rem;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap;gap:1rem}.logo{font-size:1.5rem;font-weight:800;background:var(--gradient-primary);-webkit-background-clip:text;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent;background-clip:text}.nav{display:flex;gap:0.5rem;align-items:center;flex-wrap:wrap}.nav a{padding:0.5rem 1rem;border-radius:var(--radius);color:var(--clr-text-dark);font-weight:500;transition:var(--transition)}.nav a:hover{background:var(--clr-off-white);color:var(--clr-royal-blue)}.btn{padding:0.75rem 1.5rem;border-radius:var(--radius);border:none;cursor:pointer;font-weight:600;font-size:1rem;display:inline-block;transition:var(--transition);text-align:center}.btn-primary{background:var(--gradient-cta);color:var(--clr-white);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.btn-primary:hover{transform:translateY(-2px);box-shadow:var(--shadow-lg),var(--shadow-glow)}.btn-outline{border:2px solid var(--clr-royal-blue);color:var(--clr-royal-blue);background:transparent}.btn-outline:hover{background:var(--clr-royal-blue);color:var(--clr-white)}.hero{background:var(--gradient-primary);color:var(--clr-white);padding:4rem 2rem;text-align:center;position:relative;overflow:hidden}.hero::before{content:'';position:absolute;top:-50%;right:-50%;width:100%;height:100%;background:radial-gradient(circle,hsla(42,95%,55%,0.15),transparent);animation:pulse 4s ease-in-out infinite}@keyframes pulse{0%,100%{transform:scale(1);opacity:1}50%{transform:scale(1.1);opacity:0.8}}.hero-container{max-width:900px;margin:0 auto;position:relative;z-index:1}.hero h1{font-size:clamp(2rem,5vw,3.5rem);margin-bottom:1.5rem;line-height:1.2;text-shadow:0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)}.hero p{font-size:clamp(1rem,2.5vw,1.25rem);margin-bottom:2rem;opacity:0.95;max-width:700px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}.hero-cta{display:inline-flex;flex-direction:column;gap:1rem;margin-top:2rem}.rating{display:inline-flex;align-items:center;gap:0.5rem;font-size:1.25rem;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.1);padding:0.75rem 1.5rem;border-radius:var(--radius);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);margin-top:1rem}.star{color:var(--clr-gold);fill:var(--clr-gold);width:24px;height:24px}.container{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto;padding:0 2rem}.section{padding:4rem 0}.section-title{text-align:center;margin-bottom:3rem}.section-title h2{font-size:clamp(1.75rem,4vw,2.5rem);color:var(--clr-text-dark);margin-bottom:0.5rem}.section-title p{color:var(--clr-text-muted);font-size:1.125rem;max-width:600px;margin:0 auto}.section-muted{background:var(--gradient-soft)}.value-prop{text-align:center;max-width:900px;margin:3rem auto;padding:3rem 2rem;background:var(--clr-white);border-radius:var(--radius);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.value-prop h2{color:var(--clr-deep-blue);margin-bottom:1rem}.value-prop p{font-size:1.125rem;color:var(--clr-text-muted);line-height:1.8}.features{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr));gap:2rem;margin:3rem 0}.feature{text-align:center;padding:2rem;background:var(--clr-white);border-radius:var(--radius);box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm);transition:var(--transition)}.feature:hover{transform:translateY(-5px);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.feature-icon{width:4rem;height:4rem;border-radius:50%;background:linear-gradient(135deg,hsla(220,70%,45%,0.1),hsla(42,95%,55%,0.1));display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;margin:0 auto 1rem;font-size:2rem}.feature h3{font-size:1.25rem;margin-bottom:0.5rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.feature p{color:var(--clr-text-muted);font-size:0.95rem}.services-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(280px,1fr));gap:2rem;margin:2rem 0}.service-card{background:var(--clr-white);border-radius:var(--radius);overflow:hidden;box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm);transition:var(--transition);border:2px solid transparent;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.service-card:hover{transform:translateY(-8px);box-shadow:var(--shadow-lg);border-color:var(--clr-royal-blue)}.service-image{width:100%;height:200px;object-fit:cover;background:var(--gradient-primary)}.service-content{padding:1.5rem;flex-grow:1;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.service-title{font-size:1.25rem;margin-bottom:0.75rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.service-description{color:var(--clr-text-muted);margin-bottom:1rem;line-height:1.6;flex-grow:1;font-size:0.95rem}.service-rating{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:0.5rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.service-price-row{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;margin-top:auto;padding-top:1rem;border-top:1px solid var(--clr-border)}.price-info{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.price-label{font-size:0.875rem;color:var(--clr-text-muted);margin-bottom:0.25rem}.price{font-size:2rem;font-weight:800;background:var(--gradient-primary);-webkit-background-clip:text;-webkit-text-fill-color:transparent;background-clip:text;line-height:1}.testimonials-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(300px,1fr));gap:2rem;margin:2rem 0}.testimonial-card{background:var(--clr-white);padding:2rem;border-radius:var(--radius);box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm);transition:var(--transition);border-left:4px solid var(--clr-gold)}.testimonial-card:hover{box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.testimonial-rating{display:flex;gap:0.25rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.testimonial-text{font-style:italic;margin-bottom:1rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark);font-size:1rem;line-height:1.7}.testimonial-footer{border-top:1px solid var(--clr-border);padding-top:1rem}.testimonial-author{font-weight:700;color:var(--clr-text-dark);margin-bottom:0.25rem}.testimonial-service{font-size:0.875rem;color:var(--clr-text-muted)}.bio-section{max-width:900px;margin:0 auto;background:var(--clr-white);padding:3rem;border-radius:var(--radius);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md);text-align:center}.bio-section h2{color:var(--clr-deep-blue);margin-bottom:1.5rem}.bio-section h3{color:var(--clr-royal-blue);margin:2rem 0 1rem;font-size:1.5rem}.bio-section p{color:var(--clr-text-muted);line-height:1.8;margin-bottom:1rem;font-size:1.05rem}.bio-section ul{text-align:left;max-width:600px;margin:1.5rem auto;list-style:none;padding:0}.bio-section li{padding:0.5rem 0;color:var(--clr-text-muted);position:relative;padding-left:1.5rem}.bio-section li::before{content:'âœ“';position:absolute;left:0;color:var(--clr-gold);font-weight:bold}.faq{max-width:900px;margin:0 auto}.faq-item{background:var(--clr-white);padding:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem;border-radius:var(--radius);border:1px solid var(--clr-border);transition:var(--transition)}.faq-item:hover{border-color:var(--clr-royal-blue);box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm)}.faq-question{font-size:1.25rem;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0.75rem;color:var(--clr-deep-blue)}.faq-answer{color:var(--clr-text-muted);line-height:1.8;font-size:1rem}.blog-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(320px,1fr));gap:2rem;margin:2rem 0}.blog-card{background:var(--clr-white);border-radius:var(--radius);overflow:hidden;box-shadow:var(--shadow-sm);transition:var(--transition)}.blog-card:hover{transform:translateY(-3px);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.blog-header{padding:1.5rem;border-bottom:1px solid var(--clr-border)}.blog-meta{display:flex;gap:1rem;color:var(--clr-text-muted);font-size:0.875rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.blog-title{font-size:1.25rem;margin-bottom:0.5rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.blog-title a{color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.blog-title a:hover{color:var(--clr-royal-blue)}.blog-category{color:var(--clr-royal-blue);font-weight:600;font-size:0.875rem;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:0.5px}.blog-content{padding:1.5rem}.blog-excerpt{color:var(--clr-text-muted);margin-bottom:1rem;line-height:1.6}.post-content{max-width:800px;margin:2rem auto;background:var(--clr-white);padding:3rem;border-radius:var(--radius);box-shadow:var(--shadow-md)}.post-content h2{font-size:2rem;margin:2rem 0 1rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.post-content h3{font-size:1.5rem;margin:1.5rem 0 0.75rem;color:var(--clr-text-dark)}.post-content p{margin-bottom:1rem;line-height:1.8;color:var(--clr-text-muted)}.post-content ul,.post-content ol{margin-left:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.post-content li{margin-bottom:0.5rem;color:var(--clr-text-muted)}.footer{background:var(--clr-deep-blue);color:var(--clr-white);padding:3rem 2rem;margin-top:4rem}.footer-content{max-width:1200px;margin:0 auto;text-align:center}.footer h3{color:var(--clr-gold);margin-bottom:1rem}.footer p{color:rgba(255,255,255,0.8);line-height:1.8;max-width:800px;margin:0 auto 2rem}.footer-disclaimer{border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);padding-top:2rem;margin-top:2rem;font-size:0.875rem;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.6)}.cta-box{background:var(--gradient-cta);color:var(--clr-white);padding:3rem 2rem;border-radius:var(--radius);text-align:center;margin:3rem auto;max-width:900px;box-shadow:var(--shadow-lg)}.cta-box h3{font-size:2rem;margin-bottom:1rem}.cta-box p{font-size:1.125rem;margin-bottom:2rem;opacity:0.95}@media(max-width:768px){.header-container{flex-direction:column;text-align:center}.nav{justify-content:center}.hero{padding:3rem 1.5rem}.hero h1{font-size:2rem}.section{padding:3rem 0}.services-grid,.testimonials-grid,.blog-grid{grid-template-columns:1fr}.bio-section,.post-content{padding:2rem}}@media(max-width:480px){.container{padding:0 1rem}.btn{padding:0.65rem 1.25rem;font-size:0.95rem}.service-card{margin-bottom:1rem}}

div.p: Receive divine direction, breakthrough answers & biblical wisdom from an experienced spiritual advisor. Fast 24-48hr delivery.

A prophetic word is divine spiritual guidance that reveals God's purpose, direction, and insight for your life. It provides clarity about your future, helps you understand your calling, and offers biblical wisdom for important decisions. Through prayer and spiritual discernment, I deliver personalized prophetic words that speak directly to your unique situation, helping you navigate life's challenges with confidence and faith.
Experience transformative spiritual guidance backed by 20+ years of experience
Receive your prophetic word within 24-48 hours via WhatsApp
Join hundreds of satisfied clients who experienced breakthrough
Every word is grounded in scripture and spiritual truth
Each prophetic word is uniquely crafted for your situation
Choose the prophetic guidance that speaks to your heart
Receive a powerful prophetic word specifically for your life in 2025. Discover divine direction, breakthrough answers, and biblical wisdom tailored to your unique journey.
Experience divine favor through prophetic blessings. Includes personalized prayers for breakthrough, protection, and abundance in every area of your life.
Receive biblically-grounded spiritual guidance for your life decisions. Each word is rooted in scripture and delivered with prophetic clarity.
Comprehensive prophetic reading covering your destiny, purpose, relationships, career, and spiritual journey. The most detailed and transformative prophetic guidance.
Real stories from people whose lives were transformed
"Absolutely amazing experience! The prophetic word I received was incredibly accurate and gave me the guidance I needed. Highly recommend!"
"John has a true gift. The blessing prayer brought peace to my life and clarity about my future. Worth every penny!"
"The spiritual guidance was exactly what I needed. Very professional and delivered quickly. Will definitely order again!"
"Powerful and transformative! The prophetic word helped me make important life decisions. Thank you so much!"
"I was skeptical at first, but the accuracy and depth of the spiritual reading blew me away. Truly blessed to have found this service!"
"Outstanding service! The biblical guidance provided was insightful and encouraging. My faith has been strengthened tremendously."

div.h3: John S - Master Prophet & Spiritual Guide
div.p: With over 20 years of experience in prophetic ministry, I have dedicated my life to helping individuals discover God's divine purpose and direction. My journey began with a powerful encounter with the Holy Spirit, which ignited a passion for delivering accurate, biblically-grounded prophetic words that transform lives.

Throughout my ministry, I have witnessed countless breakthroughs, healings, and life transformations through the power of prophetic guidance. Each prophetic word I deliver is crafted through prayer, biblical study, and spiritual discernment, ensuring that you receive authentic, life-changing guidance.

ul.li: 20+ years of proven prophetic accuracy and spiritual guidance
490+ five-star reviews from satisfied clients worldwide
Biblically-rooted approach grounded in scripture and prayer
Personalized guidance tailored to your unique life situation
Fast 24-48 hour delivery for timely spiritual insight
Commitment to confidentiality, integrity, and spiritual authenticity

div.p: My mission is to help you unlock your divine destiny, navigate life's challenges with confidence, and experience the fullness of God's purpose for your life. I believe that every person has a unique calling, and through prophetic insight, you can discover and fulfill that calling.
Everything you need to know about our prophetic services

A prophetic word is divine spiritual guidance that reveals God's purpose, direction, and insight for your life. It provides clarity about your future, helps you understand your calling, and offers biblical wisdom for important decisions. Prophetic words are rooted in scripture and delivered through spiritual discernment.

div.h3: How do I receive my prophetic word?
div.p: After selecting your service, you'll receive a WhatsApp contact link. Simply send your order details and transaction confirmation via WhatsApp to +216-93-816-607. Your personalized prophetic word will be delivered within 24-48 hours through written text or audio message.

div.h3: How accurate are the prophetic words?
div.p: Our prophetic words have a proven track record with 490+ five-star reviews. Clients consistently report experiencing breakthrough, clarity, and accurate guidance. Each word is delivered through prayer, biblical study, and spiritual discernment to ensure authenticity and accuracy.

We combine 20+ years of prophetic experience with a commitment to biblical accuracy and personalized guidance. Each word is uniquely crafted for you, delivered quickly (24-48hrs), and backed by hundreds of testimonials. We focus on practical, life-changing spiritual insight that you can apply immediately.

Most prophetic words are delivered within 24-48 hours after order confirmation. Rush delivery may be available upon request. You'll receive your prophetic word via WhatsApp in a format that's easy to save, review, and reflect upon.

Yes! When placing your order via WhatsApp, you can include specific questions or areas of your life where you need guidance (relationships, career, ministry, finances, health, etc.). This helps us deliver the most relevant and impactful prophetic word for your situation.

div.h3: Ready to Receive Your Prophetic Word?
div.p: Join 490+ satisfied clients who have experienced breakthrough, clarity, and divine direction through our prophetic services. Your transformation starts today.
Providing prophetic words, spiritual guidance, and biblical wisdom to help you discover your divine purpose and navigate life's journey with confidence and faith.
Contact: +216-93-816-607 (WhatsApp)

Disclaimer: Prophetic words and spiritual guidance are provided for inspirational and educational purposes. Results may vary by individual. Our services are designed to complement your personal faith journey and should not replace professional advice for legal, medical, or financial matters. All prophetic words are delivered through prayer and spiritual discernment rooted in biblical principles.
© 2025 Divine Spiritual Guidance. All rights reserved.
